name: Disguised (qubox_x)
description:
Everyone knows if you want to steal something you normally better  stay away from security, cameras and such things. 

In Disguised you have to show guts. Evade all of the security, cameras and lasers to achive your goal and get the treasure.

Features:

  • search your way through the level and get the treasure
  • watch out for traps and security to dont get busted, only if no one nows you stoled  the treasure youre a good thief
  • think carefully when the best time comes to move - patience brings success

Controlls:

ActionKeyboardGamepadMoveW/A/S/DD-Pad/Left Stick
SprintShift/CtrlRight ShoulderPauseEscapeStartOpen DoorsEButton South
